column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////There are few caf√©s that I rate. But this is some place that has to stand out! I mean
column3: and very wonderful food! I recommend the Tuscan Panini and the fall lattes which are specialities! This place is awesome and has 15 minute waits
